statements: SELECT * FROM legislative_bills;
SELECT bill_id, bill_title, current_stage FROM legislative_bills WHERE current_stage = 'Passed Senate';
SELECT bill_number, sponsor_name, introduction_date, last_action_date FROM legislative_bills ORDER BY introduction_date DESC;
SELECT bill_id, bill_number, bill_title, sponsor_name, introduction_date FROM legislative_bills WHERE sponsor_name LIKE 'Sen%';
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills WHERE current_stage = 'Passed House' AND introduction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY introduction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills WHERE current_stage = 'Introduced';
SELECT bill_title, sponsor_name FROM legislative_bills WHERE introduction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT bill_number, bill_title, current_stage FROM legislative_bills WHERE last_action_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills WHERE sponsor_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT bill_id, bill_title FROM legislative_bills ORDER BY introduction_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM bill_progress;
SELECT bill_name, current_stage FROM bill_progress;
SELECT bill_name, start_date, end_date FROM bill_progress WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stage ORDER BY stage_name DESC;
SELECT stage_name, stage_id FROM stage WHERE stage_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM bill_progress WHERE bill_id = 1;
SELECT bill_name, current_stage FROM bill_progress WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM bill_progress WHERE current_stage = 'Final' AND end_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT bp.bill_name, s.stage_name FROM bill_progress bp JOIN stage s ON bp.current_stage = s.stage_name;
SELECT * FROM bill_progress WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM LegislativeBills LIMIT 5
SELECT bill_id, bill_name FROM LegislativeBills WHERE stage='Passed'
SELECT bill_name, last_update_date FROM LegislativeBills ORDER BY last_update_date DESC

SELECT LegislativeBills.bill_name, BillStages.stage_name FROM LegislativeBills INNER JOIN BillHistory ON LegislativeBills.bill_id = BillHistory.bill_id INNER JOIN BillStages ON BillHistory.stage_id = BillStages.stage_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bills FROM LegislativeBills
SELECT * FROM LegislativeBills WHERE stage='Passed' ORDER BY bill_name ASC
SELECT bill_name, stage FROM LegislativeBills JOIN BillHistory ON LegislativeBills.bill_id = BillHistory.bill_id WHERE date_updated > '2020-01-01'

SELECT bill_name, stage, stage_name FROM LegislativeBills JOIN BillHistory ON LegislativeBills.bill_id = BillHistory.bill_id JOIN BillStages ON BillHistory.stage_id = BillStages.stage_id ORDER BY stage_name DESC
SELECT bill_name, stage, last_update_date FROM LegislativeBills WHERE last_update_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_update_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bills FROM LegislativeBills WHERE stage='Pending'
SELECT * FROM bills;
SELECT bill_id, bill_name, bill_status FROM bills WHERE bill_status = 'Pending';
SELECT bill_name, introduction_date FROM bills ORDER BY introduction_date DESC;
SELECT bill_name, sponsor_name, stage_name FROM bills JOIN bill_tracking ON bills.bill_id = bill_tracking.bill_id JOIN stages ON stages.stage_id = bill_tracking.stage_id;
SELECT username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE bill_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY introduction_date DESC;
SELECT bill_name, sponsor_name, introduction_date FROM bills WHERE introduction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY introduction_date ASC;

SELECT bills.bill_name, stages.stage_name, bill_tracking.date_reached_stage FROM bills JOIN bill_tracking ON bills.bill_id = bill_tracking.bill_id JOIN stages ON bill_tracking.stage_id = stages.stage_id WHERE stages.stage_name = 'Senate Vote' ORDER BY bill_tracking.date_reached_stage ASC;

SELECT users.username, bills.bill_name, bill_tracking.date_reached_stage FROM users JOIN bills ON users.user_id = bills.sponsor_id JOIN bill_tracking ON bills.bill_id = bill_tracking.bill_id WHERE users.role = 'Congressman' ORDER BY bill_tracking.date_reached_stage DESC;

SELECT bills.bill_name, bills.bill_status, stages.stage_name, users.username FROM bills JOIN bill_tracking ON bills.bill_id = bill_tracking.bill_id JOIN stages ON bill_tracking.stage_id = stages.stage_id JOIN users ON bill_tracking.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Bill;
SELECT bill_id, title FROM Bill WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Bill ORDER BY bill_number DESC;
SELECT bill_id, title, status FROM Bill WHERE status = 'Approved' ORDER BY bill_id ASC;
SELECT b.bill_number, bs.stage_name, bp.date_progress FROM Bill b JOIN BillProgress bp ON b.bill_id = bp.bill_id JOIN BillStage bs ON bp.stage_id = bs.stage_id;
SELECT * FROM Bill;
SELECT title, status FROM Bill WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT b.bill_number, bs.stage_name, bp.date_progress FROM Bill b JOIN BillProgress bp ON b.bill_id = bp.bill_id JOIN BillStage bs ON bs.stage_id = bp.stage_id;
SELECT l.name, l.party, b.title FROM Legislator l JOIN BillAuthor ba ON l.legislator_id = ba.legislator_id JOIN Bill b ON b.bill_id = ba.bill_id WHERE l.party = 'Democrat';
SELECT b.title, bs.stage_name, bp.date_progress FROM Bill b JOIN BillProgress bp ON b.bill_id = bp.bill_id JOIN BillStage bs ON bs.stage_id = bp.stage_id WHERE bp.date_progress > '2022-01-01';
